message.content:
I need to identify assets held for sale in the ordinary course of business from the balance sheet. These would typically be classified as inventory.

Looking at the balance sheet provided, I can see that "Inventory" is listed as a line item under current assets. This represents goods that are held for sale, in production, or being manufactured.

The values for inventory in the balance sheet are:
- Initial value: 0.00 (as of 2023-12-31)
- End value: 7783800.00 (as of 2024-02-04)

So the assets held for sale in the ordinary course of business (inventory) had an initial value of 0.00 and an end value of 7783800.00.

```json
{"solution": {'initial value': '0.00', 'end value': '7783800.00'}}
```
